content.value:
We are located a one block form the meeting point of the culture in Bogota, the traditional square “Chorro de Quevedo” and a couples of block of the most interesting places as such museums, typical restaurants, craft stores, coffee shops, libraries and Monserrate with the most beautiful view of Bogota.

We offer you privates rooms and shared dorms, a common area and relax zone a very equipped kitchen, WiFi in all the house and computers for your use, also laundry service, free soap, city maps and breakfast included. New mattresses, the most comfortableness blankets and pillows, finally we have a lot of free plans for you like a free tours and parties around the city.

Located in Bogota city’s historic centre, Lima Limón Candelaria Hostel combines art, colours, comfort and a relaxing atmosphere. There is a fully equipped common kitchen and a terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available.
The rooms and dormitories in Lima Limon Candelaria Hostel are colourful and feature shared bathroom facilities.
Lima Limon Candelaria has an art gallery and a 24-hour front desk service. There is also a tour desk. Luggage storage is possible.
Chorro Quevedo Square is 1 block away and Bolivar Square is 10 blocks away. El Dorado Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

description.description: In one of the jewels of the historical center of Bogota we have our colourful, traditional and original house that takes you to another age with the gallery of great Colombian characters.
